oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Anne Murray Live at the Belmont Park - 1978-09-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Belmont Park live show. The tape features a live performance of Anne Murray (musician). The Belmont Park live show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Anne Murray is from September 03, 1978.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Anne Murray
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) An unidentified host introduces Anne Murray -- (00:38) Break My Mind (Anne Murray) -- (04:00) Blue Finger Lou (Anne Murray) -- (06:51) Murray greets the audience -- (07:32) Danny's Song (Anne Murray) -- (10:29) I Just Fall in Love Again (Anne Murray) -- (14:15) Murray wishes Ron Churcot (unconfirmed) a speedy recovery -- (15:02) You Need Me (Anne Murray) -- (18:46) Robbie's Song for Jesus (Anne Murray) -- (22:16) Love Song (Anne Murray) -- (25:09) Walk Right By (Anne Murray) -- (28:12) Murray reflects on being faithful -- (28:34) Let's Keep it That Way (Anne Murray) -- (32:08) Walk Right Back (Anne Murray) -- (34:34) Snowbird (Anne Murray) -- (37:18) You Won't See Me (Anne Murray) -- (41:45) The unidentified host thanks Murray and discusses Kenny Roger's upcoming show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Murray, Anne; Murray, Anne, 1945-;
